articles.author: Sophie Kiderlin
articles.title: EU chief proposes plan to 'urgently' increase defense spending by mobilizing around $840 billion - CNBC
articles.description: "Europe is ready to massively boost its defense spending," European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said Tuesday.
articles.content: New plans from the European Union to increase defense spending could potentially mobilize as much as 800 billion euros ($841 billion), European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said Tuesday.… [+1966 chars]
